com.commercetools.sync.products.utils

Class VariantReferenceReplacementUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.commercetools.sync.products.utils.VariantReferenceReplacementUtils

  • public final class VariantReferenceReplacementUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Util class which provides utilities that can be used when syncing resources from a source commercetools project to a target one.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductVariantDraft> replaceVariantsReferenceIdsWithKeys(java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductVariant> productVariants)
      Takes a list of Variants that are supposed to have their prices', assets' and attributes' references expanded in order to be able to fetch the keys and replace the reference ids with the corresponding keys and then return a new list of product variant drafts with their references containing keys instead of the ids.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • replaceVariantsReferenceIdsWithKeys

        @Nonnull
public static java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductVariantDraft> replaceVariantsReferenceIdsWithKeys(@Nonnull
                                                                                                                      java.util.List<io.sphere.sdk.products.ProductVariant> productVariants)
        Takes a list of Variants that are supposed to have their prices', assets' and attributes' references expanded in order to be able to fetch the keys and replace the reference ids with the corresponding keys and then return a new list of product variant drafts with their references containing keys instead of the ids.

        Note:If the references are not expanded for a product variant, the reference ids will not be replaced with keys and will still have their ids in place.

        Parameters:
        productVariants - the product variants to replace their reference ids with keys
        Returns:
        a list of product variant drafts with keys instead of ids for references.
